Package org.bukkit.entity

Interface Entity

All Known Subinterfaces:
Animals, Arrow, Boat, Chicken, Cow, Creature, Creeper, Egg, Explosive, FallingSand, Fireball, Fish, Flying, Ghast, Giant, HumanEntity, Item, LightningStrike, LivingEntity, Minecart, Monster, Painting, Pig, PigZombie, Player, PoweredMinecart, Projectile, Sheep, Skeleton, Slime, Snowball, Spider, Squid, StorageMinecart, TNTPrimed, Vehicle, WaterMob, Weather, Wolf, Zombie
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProjectile, CraftAnimals, CraftArrow, CraftBoat, CraftChicken, CraftCow, CraftCreature, CraftCreeper, CraftEgg, CraftEntity, CraftFallingSand, CraftFireball, CraftFish, CraftFlying, CraftGhast, CraftGiant, CraftHumanEntity, CraftItem, CraftLightningStrike, CraftLivingEntity, CraftMinecart, CraftMonster, CraftPainting, CraftPig, CraftPigZombie, CraftPlayer, CraftPoweredMinecart, CraftSheep, CraftSkeleton, CraftSlime, CraftSnowball, CraftSpider, CraftSquid, CraftStorageMinecart, CraftTNTPrimed, CraftVehicle, CraftWaterMob, CraftWeather, CraftWolf, CraftZombie
public interface Entity
Represents a base entity in the world

      boolean teleport(Location location)
      Teleports this entity to the given location
      Parameters:
      location - New location to teleport this entity to
      Returns:
      true if the teleport was successful

      boolean teleport(Entity destination)
      Teleports this entity to the target Entity
      Parameters:

      true if the teleport was successful

    • getNearbyEntities

      List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(double x, double y, double z)
      Returns a list of entities within a bounding box defined by x,y,z centered around player
      Parameters:
      x - Size of the box along x axis
      y - Size of the box along y axis
      z - Size of the box along z axis
      Returns:
      List List of entities nearby

    • getPassenger

      Entity getPassenger()
      Gets the primary passenger of a vehicle. For vehicles that could have multiple passengers, this will only return the primary passenger.
      Returns:
      an entity

      passenger -
      Returns:

    • getLastDamageCause

      EntityDamageEvent getLastDamageCause()
      Retrieve the last EntityDamageEvent inflicted on this entity. This event may have been cancelled.
      Returns:
      the last known EntityDamageEvent or null if hitherto unharmed
